rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall with foyer, reception area. Vastu-aligned to the south for positive energy entry.
Open living space that opens towards a central courtyard. Provides abundant natural light and ventilation.
Adjacent to the kitchen and adjacent to the living room with access to the courtyard.
Fully equipped kitchen with storage. Located towards the northeast as per Vastu principles for positive energy in food preparation.
Spacious bedroom with an adjoining balcony overlooking the courtyard. Placed north-west to enhance tranquility and balance.
Room designed for guest accommodation with a private balcony facing the central courtyard. Aligned west for calm energy.
Luxurious master suite with an expansive balcony for privacy and natural light. Placed in the northeast to optimize health and prosperity.

Each bedroom features a private balcony designed to provide an open, airy outlook towards the courtyard or exterior garden. Balconies are positioned as per Vastu guidelines for positive air flow and energy.
Open central space fostering natural light, ventilation, and social interaction. Placed in the core to connect different parts of the house and enhance feng shui.

openings.description: Grand entrance door ensuring smooth flow according to Vastu principles.
Balconies serving as transitional spaces between interior and exterior environments, enhancing natural light and ventilation.
Large windows ensuring abundant daylight and cross-ventilation.
Gateway to the swimming pool area designed for relaxation and aesthetics; Vastu consideration ensures a harmonious balance with other elements.

rooms.description: Luxurious master suite with additional private balcony. Vastu-aligned to the northeast for health and prosperity.
Room designed for family use with a private balcony facing the courtyard. Aligned east as per Vastu guidelines.
Spacious room with an adjoining balcony overlooking the interior garden. Positioned west for balanced energy.
Each bedroom features a private balcony offering views of the central courtyard and ensuring natural ventilation as per Vastu guidelines.

openings.description: Main staircase providing access between floors. Designed with safety and aesthetic considerations in mind.
Each bedroom is provided with a private balcony, promoting fresh air and an unobstructed view of the surrounding landscape.
